ing.item: Yukon Gold pottoes (or any kind of Russet potato), peeled and cut into 2 inch pieces
Smoked trout, skinned and flaked,,,,or=99 substitute smoked salmon
Roasted red pepper, cut into 2 inch by 1/8 inch strips (get the ruler out)

directions.step:
Preheat oven to 350
Trim stems, cut in half lengthwise, remove core leaving cups of darker green leaves. Steam sprout cups for 6 minutes or until they're tender when pierced with a sharp knife and are still bright green. Drain upside down on paper towels. Cook pototoes until tender , drain, ad0d milk, olive oil and salt. Beat until smooth. Gently fold in trout. +1/4> spoon into shells and place pepper strips on top. bas.Ã¸k=BF=E4=FDx=A7=D2 bake for 3 to 5 minutes. Posted to FOODWINE Digest 10 November 96
